autoProficiency.name: Automatically Add Proficiency Bonus to Attack Rolls

integrationWithPolyglot.name: Integration with Polyglot
integrationWithPolyglot.hint: Set up different rolltable one for each language and change the audio file with customized one for that language

notehidelabel.name: Hide Environment Interaction Note Label
notehidelabel.hint: If checked only the icon will appear

notecolorlabel.name: Change Color when Notes are present
notecolorlabel.hint: Change Color when Notes are present

acelibDefaultShow.name: Show Macro editor by default
acelibDefaultShow.hint: Shows the code editor by default instead of the default editor

interactWithEnvironment.selectTokenWarn: Select a token to interact with environment.
interactWithEnvironment.noValidRequestWarn: The string request for tokenbar module is not a valid one
interactWithEnvironment.title: Select Action

note.label: Environment Interaction Note
note.event-use-environment-interaction: ENABLE: Enable this item from environment interaction, will become invisible for al non GM player and will show up on the interaction  item list
note.event-use-item-macro: ITEM MACRO: Enable the item macro integration, if this enable will launch the macro setted with the module 'item macro' (if present or it will do nothing), and will ignore the 'Event','success' and 'failure' settings
note.event-use-item-environment: ITEM ENVIRONMENT: Enable the use of the enviroment token instead the standard use, where the action is launched like tje item was in the inventory of the iteractor token (the player usually). ATTENTION : If is a contested roll is a contested roll with himself...
note.event-detail: DETAIL: the sub-label with some additional info on the voice
note.event-info: INFO: dialog showed up when click on the information icon if you want to show some information before click
note.event: EVENT: the label for manage the interaction,
note.event-condition: CONDITION: Macro/Code for decide if the interactor token can see the voice
note.event-success: SUCCESS: Macro/Code to run when the interaction is consider a success
note.event-failure: FAILURE: Macro/Code to run when the interaction is consider a failure

environment-interaction.macroExecution: There was an error in your macro syntax. See the console (F12) for details
